subredditUsers.label: Match Users
subredditUsers.helpText: Enter users to match, seperate users with a comma. (e.g. PlexversalHD, u/dev-insights, u/spez)
subredditUsers.placeholder: Optional (but at least one text box should be filled).

subredditFlairText.label: Match Flair Text
subredditFlairText.helpText: Enter flair text to match, seperate flair text with a comma. (e.g. Dev, Community manager, :YT: YouTuber)
subredditFlairText.placeholder: Optional (but at least one text box should be filled).

subredditFlairCssclass.label: Match Flair CSS
subredditFlairCssclass.helpText: Enter flair text shown in subreddit flair settings, seperate flair text with a comma. (e.g. dev, community-manager, youtuber)
subredditFlairCssclass.placeholder: Optional (but at least one text box should be filled).
